Function Documentation

int create_message ( string  plugin_name,
string  message,
char *  buff 
)

Construct a GENERIC_SERVER message for a plug-in

This function will add appropiate headers and construct a GENERIC_SERVER compliant message

Parameters:
[in] plug_name to be used for the message
[in] message to be created
Returns:
1, will always succeed
